sentence.Network_en: I recommend you not to disobey your officers.
sentence.Network_cn: 我劝你不要不服从你的长官.

sentence.Network_en: I'll learn you how to disobey my orders!
sentence.Network_cn: 我要给你一点厉害看看不服从我的命令会怎么样!

sentence.Network_en: Those who disobey will be severely punished.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 高中英语新课程标准词汇表 ... dismiss vt. 让……离开；遣散；解散；解雇 disobey vt. 不服从 distance n. 距离.
拂字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 击〖 strikeatglancingangle〗 违背;逆〖 disobey〗 掠过或轻轻擦过〖 sweep〗.
拗_百度百科 ... 转折；弯转〖 turn;bend〗 违反；不服从〖 disobey;violate〗 不顺口，作旧诗时平仄不依常格〖 hard to pronounce〗.
违字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 违禁〖 violateaban〗 违抗〖 disobey;defy;becontraryto〗 违利赴名〖 beblindedbycupidity〗.

list.abs: Three of them were punished for disobeying orders ., 他们当中有三个人因为不服从命令受到惩罚.
but many drivers and pedestrians still disobey traffic rules ., 但是很多行人和司机还是不遵守交通规则.
condition # 2 : after Adam fell , all are free only disobey God .状况2﹕亚当堕落之后﹐全人类都只有不顺服神的自由。
I recommend that you do not disobey your officer ., 我劝你不要反抗你的长官.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French desobeir, based on Latin oboedire 'obey' (see obey)

entry.def: When someone disobeys a person or an order, they deliberately do not do what they have been told to do.

example.ex: ...a naughty boy who often disobeyed his mother and father...
example.tran: 一个经常和父母对着干的淘气男孩

example.ex: He urged Russian soldiers to disobey orders if asked to fire on civilian targets...
example.tran: 他鼓动俄国士兵若被要求向平民开火就抗命不从。

means.word_mean: 1. refuse to go along with; refuse to follow; be disobedient;

sentences.sentence: "He disobeyed his superviser and was fired"

auth_sentence.content: Normally, judges punish people who disobey orders with fines.
auth_sentence.res_content: Normally, judges punish people who disobey orders with fines.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Normally, judges punish people who disobey orders with fines.

auth_sentence.content: Soldiers who disobey orders to crush protests risk being shot.
auth_sentence.res_content: Soldiers who disobey orders to crush protests risk being shot.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Soldiers who disobey orders to crush protests risk being shot.

auth_sentence.content: We are not suggesting that people should disobey the current rules.
auth_sentence.res_content: We are not suggesting that people should disobey the current rules.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We are not suggesting that people should disobey the current rules.

stems_affixes.word_buile: dis不+obey[v.服从, 顺从]→v.违反, 不服从

sentences.en: I recommend you not to disobey your officers.
sentences.cn: 我劝你不要不服从你的长官。

sentences.en: I’ll learn you how to disobey my orders!
sentences.cn: 我要给你一点厉害看看不服从我的命令会怎么样!

sentences.en: Jack disobeyed his father and went to the cinema.
sentences.cn: 杰克没有听父亲的话,去看电影了。
